name: Noctilim
description:
In a land rebuilt by magick, there's something looming in the shadows of the woods threatening the balance that keeps the world from splitting apart once again.

Your curiosity always gets the better of you and after an incident in the woods leaves you with more questions than answers, it's up to you to solve the mystery of the woods.

Meet people along the way and make friends (or enemies?) in your quest to get the answers you need.

DEMO FEATURES:

    • 5k words and about 30~mins of gameplay
    • Invisible protaganist
    • nameable and select your pronouns
    • Meet two characters from the main story (or more?)
    • two point and click segments

PLANNED FEATURES:

    • fully customizable protaganist (hopefully!)
    • six characters you can build relationships with
    • timed choices that affect gameplay/endings
    • multiple good/bad/worse endings
    • point and click investigation elements

CONTENT WARNING:

The demo contains brief mentions of animal death.
